content: As described in our annual report commenced in Q1 2022, in order to reflect our new management approach in managing the operations, organizational alignment, customer base and end market, we now operate in three new operating segments: satellite networks, integrated solutions and network infrastructure and services. Q1 2022 revenues of the satellite network segment, which provide advanced broadband satellite communication network and associated professional services turnkey solution and managed services in the cellular backhaul, enterprise, IFC and defense market were $24.8 million compared to $25.6 million in the same quarter last year. Q1 2022 revenues of the Integrated Solutions segment, which provides products and solutions for mission-critical defense and broadcast satellite communications systems, advanced on-the-Move/on-the-Pause satellite communications equipment system and solutions, including  mobile satellite systems and solutions were $13.7 million compared to $6.7 million in the same quarter last year. Q1 2022 revenues of the network infrastructure and services segment, which provides terrestrial and satellite network construction and operational services were $12.9 million compared to $11 million in the same quarter last year.
